# unmappedLocalizedName

**Instance Property**

The element’s localized name, not the remapped name.

## Declaration

```swift
var unmappedLocalizedName: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

To present the element that a user wants to remap in your interface, use this property to get the original name. Otherwise, use the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCControllerElement/localizedName] property to get the possibly remapped name.

## Getting a localized name

- **localizedName**: The localized name for the element or the remapped element.
